title: Shimokita GLORY DAYS
description:
Shimokita GLORY DAYS is an adaptation of a manga to a 12 episode TV show. The basic plot is a total loser moving to the big city finds a room with a bunch of really hot girls. He can&#039;t afford the rent so he pays by doing the housework. Eventually all of the girls fall in love and fight over him. It really is a live anime filled with stupidity and nudity. One of the main characters is the famous porn star Asami Yuma.

I had a hell of a time finding all of these episodes and now that I have them together I thought I should share.

Enjoy! 




    * Title: ??GLORY DAYS ??????????????
    * Title (romaji): Shimokita GLORY DAYS
    * Episodes: 12
    * Broadcast network: TV Tokyo
    * Broadcast period: 2006-Apr-14 (2006-Apr-20 on TV Osaka) to 2006-Jul-08
    * Air time: Friday 24:12
    * Opening Theme: Lovespace by Natori Kaori
